original_text: They teach you ideas about what you must do to worship God. They teach you to serve other people like a slave. They say that you must hurt yourself. You must show that you control your body. Rules like that may seem to be wise, but really they are not worth anything. They cannot stop our weak human nature from doing the bad things that we want to do.
korean_text: 이런 것들은 자의적 숭배와 겸손과 몸을 괴롭게 하는 데는 지혜 있는 모양이나 오직 육체 따르는 것을 금하는 데는 조금도 유익이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: about what you must do to worship God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 예배하기 위해 네가 해야 할 일에 대한

sentences.original_text: They teach you to serve other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네가 다른 사람들을 섬기도록 가르친다

sentences.original_text: They say that you must hurt yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네가 스스로를 다쳐야 한다고 말한다

sentences.original_text: You must show that you control your body
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 몸을 통제하고 있음을 보여야 한다

sentences.original_text: Rules like that may seem to be wise
but really they are not worth anything
They cannot stop our weak human nature
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 우리의 약한 인간 본성을 막을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: from doing the bad things that we want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 하고 싶어 하는 나쁜 일들을 하는 것으로부터
